text.0: the streams unceasing flow to indra slayer of ahi savitar god laws fulfiller.
text.1: day after day goes on the sheen of waters what time hath past since they were first set flowing.
text.2: his motherfor she knewspake and proclaimed him who was about to cast his bolt at vṛtra.
text.3: cutting their paths according to his pleasure day after day flow to their goal the rivers.
text.4: aloft he stood above the airy region and against vṛtra shot his deadly missile.
text.5: enveloped in a cloud he rushed upon him indra subdued the foe with sharpened weapons.
text.6: as with a bolt bṛhaspati fiercely flaming pierce thou vṛkadvaras the asuras heroes.
text.7: even as in time of old with might thou slewest so slay even now our enemy o indra.
text.8: cast down from heaven on high thy bolt of thunder wherewith in joy thou smitest dead the foeman.
text.9: for gain of children make us thine o indra of many childrens children and of cattle.
text.10: whomso ye love his power ye aid and strengthen ye twain are the rich worshippers advancers.
text.11: graciously favour us indra and soma give us firm standing in this time of danger.
text.12: let it not vex me tire me make me slothful and never let us say press not the soma.
text.13: for him who cares for me gives gifts supports me who comes with kine to me who pour libations.
text.14: sarasvatī protect us with the maruts allied thou boldly conquerest our foemen.
text.15: while indra does to death the daring chieftain of Śaṇḍikas exulting in his prowess.
text.16: him who waylays yea him who would destroy usaim at him pierce him with thy sharpened weapon.
text.17: bṛhaspati with arms thou slayest foemen o king give up the spoiler to destruction.
text.18: perform o hero with our valiant heroes the deeds heroic which thou hast to finish.
text.19: long have they been inflated with presumption slay them and bring us hither their possessions.
text.20: i craving joy address with hymn and homage your heavenly host the company of maruts.
text.21: that we may gain wealth with full store of heroes each day more famous and with troops of children.
